titles.title: Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act
A bill to amend subtitle A of title XX of the Social Security Act to fund additional projects that focus on competency-based training for personal or home care aides, and for other purposes.
Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Mollie Baldwin Upskilling of Personal and Home Care Aides Act
This bill provides funding through FY2032 to the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) for grants to train individuals for careers as home health aides, nursing assistants, or similar direct support professionals. HHS must award these grants, in consultation with the Department of Labor, to states, community-based organizations, and other eligible entities.
